name: Governor of Poker 3
description: Governor of Poker 3 is the best free multiplayer poker game with a great design. In this multi-player version of Governor of Poker you compete live with thousands of real poker players to prove you are the number 1 Texas Hold ’em poker star!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Reasonable DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Reasonable DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Yeah bots and a cashgrab do not give a cent to this game. Bad chat to try and hide this fact.

Lost my stake because the game auto-folded my flush while I was trying to figure out how much money my oppenent had left so I could make them go all in. I understand that this is a real-time game, so time limits are a thing - but if I've clicked 'Bet' and I'm adjusting my bet - do not auto-fold my hand.

This game is morally bankrupt. It's not real poker and the Blackjack blatantly cheats. I'm pretty good at poker and blackjack, this game insults my intelligence and the developers should be ashamed of themselves. It's free, you can waste time on here if you want but don't make any ingame purchases, you'll truly regret it. Stay away and play a different poker game, there are plenty of others out there. This one should be avoided. I mean, come on. They're not real cards, you gotta kind of expect this sort of thing is going to happen, but the eternal optimist in me gave it a shot. Alot of other poker games will not be so cheap and actually use a simulated deck. Yes, you will start off winning fine (if you know how to play poker) but then suddenly things start getting pretty dang suspicious. This should be removed from Steam immediately.
Poker vs bots. Microtransactions all over the place. AVOID this one

I had a blast first 2-3 nights, when I had low level and low cash. Then I won some, gained level, then it turned out the game is programmed to clear you out of in-game cash and pay up with real money. The game is full of bots & the draw mechanism is rigged. Not recommended.

i was playing ok, 2000up vs 4 other people. Suddenly a girl shows up and in a min we are just she and i... he won me 10 hands straight. i had a pair of Q on the flop he went all in with a 5 6... he won with 2 pairs and that was just a single hand. im not sure if he was cheating or not but i cant play here anymore.
could be good, but full of bots that devs made and duoble of same cards, devs want to scam you into buying chips

The game have big flaws which makes it a no no title to play.  The tables (places on which you can play) are being locked down if you out-level it.  For example.... lets say you get level 10 and you still want to play on low buy-ins to improve? '♥♥♥♥ you! The table is now closed for yah, go play on the 1k-5k buy-ins, so you will waste your precious money even faster and will buy in-game money from us for your real money.' ~ Developer $.$  10/10 business model  The game is full of AI controlled 'players' which pretends to be a real ones. It's like tricking community/players into thinking that this game have actual playerbase, lol. They play like players, they use emotes like players and it's getting annoying after a while that you play against AI all the ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ time. Don't even get me started that AI gets a really lucky draws, and they win a lot of the times. RIGGED... jk, but really I think it's rigged, so you will spend real money faster, before uninstalling this game.  I would give this game 2,5/10. It's fun unless, the 'beginner table' gets locked down due to your level. It have the graphics, it has animations and nice emotes.   It's fun game for first three hours. Then, it's good uninstall simulator - three click process and guess what... this option isn't locked down due to your steam level and it doesn't require spending real money. Yup that's right.  Stay away from this game.

Too many absurd high hands come out far too often. Other ridiculous stuff like players having the same exact pocket pair as you which the odds of that are beyond astronomically low. Predictable scenarios where some consistently has a hand thats better than you by 1 card. Some players seem like bots. If your looking for something to just kill time like me then fine play it but if your looking for anything near a realistic poker experience then stay far away from this game because your not going to get it.
Feels rigged, even if I win it feels like I could predict that

Manager: We need a poker-game right f****** now! Dev: Yeah, I have an idea. Let's make a game and publish it on steam so nobody will ever notice us. Manager: Wow, thats a great idea! And let's make it impossible to add friends effectivly too! Dev: John, let me say thats good but we'll need annoying country backround music for that...  'This game is awsome!' said nobody ever.

Shame.  With hundreds of thousands hands played in wsop pokerstar zygna and about a dozen other poker games out there. I would say it is pretty easy to spot a bot after a while and the bots in this game are not much different that those in Governor of Poker 1 and 2.  The devs may say that bots have been removed but I would rather see it with my own eyes. If the devs really want to prove to everyone there are no bots they should make free chat available instead of a few prescribed chat options to click on.  In any case, would hurt to try as long as you are not throwing in any real money.
THE Worst game. can't add my friends and beat their asses on this game. 1/11

this game is unplayable, too many people just go all in all the time cause they dont care about their 'game money'.. also a few pop ups are annoying..and overall its too colorful and that makes it difficult to concentrate on playin poker..but playin this game doesnt feel like playin poker..too bad  maybe one day steam will have a nice pokergame, sadly this one is unplayable
The most rigged crap I have ever seen.
this game is wallhack It is not fair

The devs claim to death that 'the game is random' and by that I'm sure they mean that the game chooses between premade hands 'randomly' for the situation, there is NO WAY ON GODS GREEN EARTH that this is a true rng, it just isnt possible with what I have seen.  Don't take this game serious at all as far as being a real random poker game. I've seen more flushes, fullhouses, AA, and straights in the last couple days than I have seen in my life playing poker (about 15 years) the hands you will see are rediculious Espeacialy when you are 3 or 2 handed. I have been on the winning end of these too, so I'ts not because I 'got beat' that I am writing this. I'm just telling you what I expierienced. I guess it has to be this way when the achievments are there for you to win so many times with a flush or a straight or full house ect (which most were completed the first few hours). Just know what you are getting into and try to have fun with it if you choose to play it, but by no means is this random shuffled hands, it's just not.
Great game to waste your time when you high on legal drugs such as Caffeine and granny BBW porn.

If you are close to commiting suicide and looking to blow your brains out this game will tip you over the edge. With cheating NPCs to scum bag slimy people stealing your hard earned money it's sure to trigger you to the point of homicidal tendencies. After spending more than a minute playing this game you will realize this game is not free because your are spending good time of your life performing in self harm by playing this, please listen and DO NOT download this ♥♥♥♥ game.
Poker is like sex if you dont have a good partner you better have a good hand. :D
Found it not interesting enough to spend my time on the game.
Alt tabbed, game broke and couldnt see cards anymore, 10/10
Since the day I downloaded this game, I still can't connect to the game server... Please fix this.. My internet connection is smooth...
I think this game not suitable for SEA players. Always DC and Lagging while playing.

This is how free to play games should be. Yes you can buy more chips, but that does not give you an advantage over other players. Most of the paided options are in cosmetics and are never forced onto you. Although there are a few players that can be very annoying, most of the community is resonable.

ok i played most of 1000 hands to give you a really helpfull analyse of this game and what can i see instead of : DON'T PLAY IT ! this game is just like you know on thoses games room with tickets everything is doing to put you down ! All draws are unfair. I also tried the sit&jackpot you buy the netry ( 2.5k / 5k / 10k / 50k / 100k ) to win a roulette price and guess what YOU NEVER GO on 1M or 250M like they said the roulette 99% of the time stops on the lowest prices ! I really like this game, the standard of play is mixed. Yes the first caouple of hands are rigged, the developers have admitted to this, but these hands are for instruction how to play. I play a lot of on line poker, it is impossible to say for sure if any gaame is rigged. I don't think this one is.
I LOVE this game.
Nice little game, mind you they dont play like its real money. Bide your time and reap the rewards.

Not a bad game but players dont play so good and for some reason you can trick everyone with bluffs.They wont risk anything and thats how they fail.This game is very easy and if you want challange,this is not the game for you.But if you just want to pass time download it.
For boring times. Their objective is to make sure you purchase their chips. Like every free-to-play poker game.   Sigh.

A poker game I can just hop into and chill. Of course it's free to play, so if you bust out either you have to wait till the chips recharge or you have to put a nice sum in. The starter pack is only $.99 for 20k chips which is not bad. Just learn to play smart and you don't have to purchase anything. Great game overall. Been looking for a good steam poker game.
I would like to see some updates for sounds :)) Expand Chat !!and.....I ll be back with some more
This game is ok :D POKER IS LIFE

Not a bad poker game. If im being honest I always forget how to play poker, sometimes I just wing it because I cba learning ALL the hands and sh*t but I can enjoy playing this game and taking peoples money from them. 7/10
Great poker game.
Fun little Poker game. Recommended for a nice, pleasant distraction.

Great little poker game. I have 120 hours on record and play it every day. For those giving it bad reviews because they are losing money then learn how to play instead of going all in on the pre-flop. If you play tactically then you will soon amass a lot of chips, I have nearly £400,000 now and no real life money used.
i love this game
very nice game love it
Fun free poker, with cool simple animations...and hats!
this game is fun..wish u had voice chat....to bad i have had some crashes in the game..other then that a good poker time....

Governor of Poker 3 is one of the best poker games I have played in a long time. Despite the micro-transactions, it is still worth the value of 'free'. If you are a good enough player, you can avoid micro-transactions and still win. The chat system keeps communication fun and friendly with pre-set chat options and faces. Your character can be customised with hats, shirts and pins (all for the gold currency, which is hard to get unless you pay for it).  The game also allows you to play blackjack for your chips. This means that (if you're feeling lucky), you can up your stack before you enter a game. Be warned! This could also put the game out of your reach with the minimum buy-in.  The game has multiple styles of poker including standard in game cash-games, sit and go's (you pay a set amount of money for entry, 5 players. 2nd comes out even, the winner gets a lot more), push or folds (small buy in with big blinds) and the big win (buy-in goes to the community pot and then you play. At the end of the time period, money is given out depending on your position on the big win chip leaderboard). They are all fantastic modes.  The one thing I would say is that a glitch made me lose all of my money. THIS WAS UNDER A SET OF UNIQUE CIRCUMSTANCES AND IS HIGHLY UNLIKELY TO HAPPEN TO YOU. I have also enjoyed climbing back to the top in the most terrifying way possible.  This is certainly a game to buy!
Pros:  -Free  Cons: -No single player
Poker is a mind ♥♥♥♥ and if you play this game, get ready to lose 10000 times because the dealer likes to use card hacks and get all of your money. I rate 10/10.

Log in...pick up free $50,000....go to blackjack table, come out with $0. oh, get another free $1000 in 4 hours! Pick up free $1000....go to blackjack table, come out with $0.  Apparently you can also play poker.  Its an ok game for free and kind of troll-proof... but seriously if you need to spend real money in exchange for fake money to gamble with...thats your prerogative.  Avoid the blackjack table.

If you love poker this is a really fun game. You'll likely have to pay for chips at some point... but they have a good deals. like 2 bucks for 500 thousand chips kind of thing. and that can keep you playing for weeks, years or hours depending on how or where you play. 10 out of 10 for a free to play. the emotes also give it a fun touch that allows for deeper psychological dementions to gambling. Fun Fun. i'm now addicted to poker. thanks Devs!
fkn so hell good yea ♥♥♥

WOW! Guess I'm one of the few that really liked this game! I found the game fun and relaxing with great graphics and sound. There are some people joining in the fun as well as Bots. Nothing wrong with Bots! For a fast paced and fun time, this might be the Texas Hold 'Em card game you're looking for...And it's free! Enjoy the game! Good job Dev's and well done!

Not to mention my MOST favorite fact - it won't tell you what hand you have, you need to know for yourself.
